name: Gemini 2.0 Flash
description: Second-generation multimodal model for the agentic era. Features native tool use, multimodal generation including image and audio output, and superior speed.
notes: Generally available with higher rate limits. Single price for all input types ($0.10/1M input, $0.40/1M output). Native image generation and text-to-speech. Supports Multimodal Live API for real-time audio/video streaming.
